Title: Package Script Writer - CLI Tool for Installing Umbraco
Description:
A modern, clean, and fully-featured starter kit for Umbraco CMS that provides a ready-to-use blog theme with headless/API capabilities. Built with Bootstrap and designed to get you up and running quickly.

Key Features:
• Modern Blog Theme - Clean, responsive design built with Bootstrap
• Pre-configured Content Types - Blog posts, categories, tags, and more
• Headless/API Support - Full Content Delivery API integration with Next.js revalidation support
• API Endpoints - Built-in endpoints for dictionary, search, and contact functionality
• OpenAPI Documentation - Swagger UI for exploring and testing API endpoints
• Multi-version Support - Compatible with Umbraco 13 (.NET 8) and Umbraco 17 (.NET 10)
• SQLite by Default - Quick setup with SQLite database for development
• No External Dependencies - Removed dependency on third-party packages like Contentment
• dotnet Template - Available as 'dotnet new' template for quick project scaffolding

Package Structure:
• Clean - Main package with views, assets, and Umbraco content (switch to Clean.Core after initial setup)
• Clean.Core - Core library with components, controllers, and helpers
• Clean.Headless - Headless CMS functionality and API controllers
• Umbraco.Community.Templates.Clean - dotnet CLI template

Perfect for developers looking to quickly start a blog project with Umbraco, whether for traditional web rendering or headless implementations with modern JavaScript frameworks like Next.js.

AuthorDetails.Name: Paul Seal
AuthorDetails.Description: Paul is an Umbraco Master and 8 x Umbraco MVP who loves making tutorials and small Umbraco packages. Creator of the Package Script Writer and various Umbraco community resources.
